ygData.subject: RE: Carillion song (was  Bard only equipment, a rant)
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope, since they are Scowls already they can t be made non-KoS.  Kill enough whatevers to make them go up to Glare and you can do it though. ... From: Reece,
ygData.messageBody:
Nope, since they are Scowls already they can't be made non-KoS. Kill enough
whatevers to make them go up to Glare and you can do it though.

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 2:14 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Carillion song (was Bard only equipment, a rant)


From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

So based on what you are saying, I could go into Feerot, target an ogre
guard (bouncer), sing the carillion and make it to where I'm not KOS
anymore, and then merrily waltz around the zone with no worry of ever
getting attacked by any ogre guards.

Galtin of E'ci

> >IIRC, it only works on one target and wears off very quickly.
>
> It only works on one target but appears to last on all members of that
> NPCs
> "type" until you zone. make one shopkeeper happy and all of that "type"
> which may vary. Make a guard happy and the shopkeepers don't like you
> again...just a typical day in Highpass Hold/High Keep for me!
>
> Tszaaz E'Taurguin
>
>
>
